description: The government is set to close all restaurants and bars, prompting anger from local officials.
title: Coronavirus: Marseille 'astonished' by new French lockdown rules
title_page: Coronavirus: Marseille 'astonished' by new French lockdown rules - BBC News
maintext: "We cannot ignore the health situation but it is almost a death sentence for the profession," he said. "We are still recovering and we are being shut down again."
